name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.client.key.provider.cache.expiry
description: DFS client security key cache expiration in milliseconds.

name: hadoop.security.group.mapping.ldap.directory.search.timeout
description:
The attribute applied to the LDAP SearchControl properties to set a
    maximum time limit when searching and awaiting a result.
    Set to 0 if infinite wait period is desired.
    Default is 10 seconds. Units in milliseconds.

name: mapreduce.job.max.split.locations
description:
The max number of block locations to store for each split for
    locality calculation.

name: dfs.block.scanner.volume.join.timeout.ms
description:
The amount of time in milliseconds that the BlockScanner times out waiting
    for the VolumeScanner thread to join during a shutdown call.

name: fs.ftp.host.port
description: FTP filesystem connects to fs.ftp.host on this port

name: dfs.client.hedged.read.threadpool.size
description:
Support 'hedged' reads in DFSClient. To enable this feature, set the parameter
    to a positive number. The threadpool size is how many threads to dedicate
    to the running of these 'hedged', concurrent reads in your client.

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.failover.sleep.max.millis
description:
Expert only. The time to wait, in milliseconds, between failover
    attempts increases exponentially as a function of the number of
    attempts made so far, with a random factor of +/- 50%. This option
    specifies the maximum value to wait between failovers.
    Specifically, the time between two failover attempts will not
    exceed +/- 50% of hadoop.security.client.failover.sleep.max.millis
    milliseconds.
